fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to load git log from file (offline version) or directly from git repository (online version)
To use offline version of plugin You should made command:
git log --pretty=format:"%H%n%ci%n%an%n%B%n%H" --raw --no-merges --abbrev=40
in folder with Your local git repository. Result of this command should be save in file on Your disk and this file should be added to this plugin in "Selected file" field
Node analyze informations about every class in every commit from given git's log file or git repository and return table with the following data:
- name of class
- marker
- author of change
- action - it can be one of:
M - modification
A - added new
D - deleted
- complete messege from commit
- original path of class
- date of change
- Uniq ID of record
Git logo icon made by Henrik Nyh
fullDescription.option: File with Git log to analyze in offline version of plugin
Marker for extraction name of class

ports.outPort: Table with data read from Git log file or Git repository
